public boolean isLegal()
Description copied from class: XMLTag
TODO: implement this as an abstract method in each tag which tests attributes for everything that the parser does/can not do. Idea is that this will be called prior to execution/entering a queue so as to ensure that all attributes are to spec.

Specified by:
isLegal in class XMLTag
Returns:
true if the tag is usable. Otherwise false.
